revised_title: Biography of Percy Edward (Peter) Kent: A Pioneering Geologist and Oil Exploration Expert
tldr: The article is a biography of Percy Edward (Peter) Kent, a renowned petroleum exploration geologist, who made significant contributions to the field of geology and oil exploration. Kent's career spanned various roles, including working for the Anglo-Iranian Oil Company and serving as the Chairman of the Natural Environment Research Council. His dedication to geology and natural resources led to numerous achievements and a lasting impact on the industry.
